translation.I always believed that the world was jus: I always believed that the world was just what I could see, but I was wrong.
translation.I found an old book filled with secrets: I found an old book filled with secrets beyond my wildest imagination.
translation.But I didn't know what I was getting mys: But I didn't know what I was getting myself into until it was too late...
